name: scepticism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an attitude that shows you doubt whether something is true or useful: The company's environmental claims have been greeted/regarded/treated with scepticism by conservationists. See
sceptical
More examplesFewer examplesThere was a climate of scepticism surrounding the conference. Perhaps he detected the suppressed scepticism in my voice. There is growing scepticism about donations to charities and what they do with the money.Others expressed scepticism about the usefulness of this procedure.Ken overcame his scepticism and decided to give it a try.
